Package ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading

Class Offer

java.lang.Object
ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading.Offer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyOffer, SellOffer
public abstract class Offer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
An abstract class that is used to help create trade offers to buy/sell assets
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Offer

      public Offer​(java.lang.String assetName, int quantity, double pricePerUnit, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String organisationalUnitName)
      Constructor for trade offer
      Parameters:
      assetName - Name of the asset to be bought or sold
      quantity - Quantity of asset
      pricePerUnit - Price of the asset
      username - The username of the user who made the offer
      organisationalUnitName - The name of the organisation whose assets and credits will be affected

    • Offer

      public Offer​(int orderID, java.lang.String assetName, int quantity, double pricePerUnit, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String organisationalUnitName)
      Overloaded Constructor for trade offer - used when retrieving offer from DB
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the offer
      assetName - Name of the asset to be bought or sold
      quantity - Quantity of asset
      pricePerUnit - Price of the asset
      username - The ID of the user who made the offer
      organisationalUnitName - The ID of the organisation whose assets and credits will be affected

  • Method Details

    • resolveOffer

      public abstract int resolveOffer()
      If there is a matched offer deduct or add appropriate amount of credits from the organisational unit's involved Also add/remove the correct amount of assets bought or sold to the organisational units Also update the offer's quantities or alternatively delete the offer when it has been fully resolved Repeat this process until the offer has been fully resolved or there are no matching offers
      Returns:
      NOT_RESOLVED if no trades occured, PARTIALLY resolved if part of the offer was resolved, and * FULLY_RESOLVED if theoffer is fully resolved

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      the offer as a string containing its ID, asset name, quantity, price, offer creator and unit name

      Getter for the offer's ID
      Returns:

    • sameAssetName

      protected boolean sameAssetName​(BuyOffer buyOffer, SellOffer sellOffer)
      Check if an offer's asset name is the same as another offer's

    • isMatching

      protected boolean isMatching​(int matchingID)
      Check if there is a matching offer
      Returns:
      true if there is a matching ID, false if the ID is equal to 0

    • orgOwnsAsset

      protected boolean orgOwnsAsset​(BuyOffer buyOffer)
      Checks if the buy organisation who listed the buy offer owns the particular asset yet (has a field in organisational_unit_assets table in the DB)
      Parameters:
      buyOffer - the buy offer to get the organisational unit from
      Returns:
      true if the org has a field otherwise false
